contexts.context: When the <mark>sun</mark> set, Lledos, Galsiah, and Imalyn approached the Cobblers...
As he prodded his mount forward and the <mark>sun</mark> began rising, Sathis pictured Galsiah and Imalyn not undergoing interrogation...
The <mark>sun</mark> was fully risen when Sathis reached the stables of his house...
...Ghostgate. Within the Ghostfence, rain never falls and the <mark>sun</mark> never shines; the only weather is the red and deadly...
